testcase.name: Test Chorus Broadband Map

failure.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of element located by By.xpath: //div[@class='location-details-now']//h3[text()='Network capability at this address now'] (tried for 2 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)

testcase.failure:
